message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CL. 

The paper proposes a novel method for incremental class learning using an autoencoder and regularization techniques to mitigate catastrophic forgetting. This involves classification and feature extraction, which are common topics in machine learning (cs.LG) and computer vision (cs.CV). The use of regularization techniques also suggests a focus on artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and neural networks (cs.NE). Finally, the evaluation of the method involves experiments on image datasets, which could also fall under natural language processing (cs.CL) due to the use of visual data.
